Harvard Division of Continuing Education | Senior Software Engineer | Cambridge MA | ONSITE https://www.extension.harvard.edu/

Harvard DCE is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to work on all aspects of our online learning environment. Our primary responsibilities center around video lecture capture and delivery via the open source Opencast Matterhorn platform. We are also very involved in developing software that integrates with Harvard's Canvas LMS, including LTI tools and Learning Engineering applications. The position description at the link below is a bit stale; our current stack includes Java, Python, Ruby, JavaScript and R/Shiny, and our apps run on AWS (via Opsworks) and Heroku.

I'm just one of the software engineers here (and not involved in the HR process) but feel free to email any direct questions to me at jluker+hn0317@g.harvard.edu, and DMs are open at @lbjay.

Apply: https://sjobs.brassring.com/tgwebhost/jobdetails.aspx?jobId=...
